section.title: File list
section.p: Here follows the list of files that you can download:

ul.li: jakarta-cactus-anttasks-<version>.zip : some generic Ant tasks that are used internally by the Cactus build scripts and which can be useful to other projects.
jakarta-cactus-doc-<version>.zip : the Cactus documentation. It contains the same information as that found on the Cactus web site, but it can be browsed locally.

Cactus currently has 4 Integration modules (a.k.a. front-ends) that you can use to run Cactus tests. You need to pick the one that corresponds to the way you want to use Cactus:
"Manual" Integration: This is the jakarta-cactus-framework-<j2eeapi>-<version>.zip zip file. It contains the core Cactus Framework jar and its javadoc.
Ant Integration: This is the jakarta-cactus-integration-ant-<j2eeapi>-<version>.zip zip file. It contains a complete ready to use Ant "plugin" that you can call directly from your own Ant scripts.
Eclipse Integration: This is the jakarta-cactus-integration-eclipse-<j2eeapi>-<version>.zip zip file. It is an Eclipse plugin.
Maven Integration: This is a Cactus plugin for Maven. This plugin is hosted by the Maven project. It can be downloaded here.
jakarta-cactus-sample-servlet-<j2eeapi>-<version>.zip : A full sample application demonstrating both how to write Cactus tests and how to use the Ant Integration module.

section.note: <version> represents the version number for releases and date stamp for nightly builds.
